title: Twin Flame: Surrender and Dissolution
description: "After years of law enforcement training and being on the force; I cant believe I didn't see it! He was beating her up right in front of me, and I didn't see it..." Emily Zwaan is a former officer residing in North Vancouver, Canada. Her best friend, Jeanna, is married to her husband, Robert. They both shared a life with his son, her stepson, Rafael. They seemed happy and content--that is what Emily wanted for her best friend after realizing her feelings for Jeanna were stronger than she expected, but her happiness was all that mattered. Finding out this was far from the truth takes Emily on a journey with her best friend, a very dark one that she wasn't prepared for.
author: Shellymar Rodriguez
